title: Beautiful 2 Bed/2 Bath Apartment in Park Like Setting*#
posting_body: *Beautiful Apartment in Park Like Setting* Updated Shaker Cabinets and Appliances HEAT included - This unit features new paint, new carpet, updated kitchen cabinets and bathroom.
